title: OPERATION VIOLET TEETH
brief: Recover an NHP fragment from the mind of a dead god.
details: An NHP fragment was encountered in the dead thoughtspace of the Cyning. Horus wants it. You probably donâ€™t. Go anyway.

title: SHELL GAME
brief: Test a prototype chassis in hostile territory.
details: The testbed mech has no failsafes, limited structure, and may attempt to override your commands. Success means funding. Failure means meat rain.
